Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Person
      • Customer

  • public class Customer
extends Person
    The Costumer class has attributes and behaviours which all costumer should be able to.
    Author:
    Muhammet Selcuk Guvel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String email,
                java.lang.String birthDate,
                double balance,
                java.lang.String password)
        Costumer class constructor which initializes the properties of customer object. It also increments the customerID when the object is created. It assigns status to "CLASSIC" by default.
        Parameters:
        name - the customer's name
        email - the customer's email
        birthDate - the customer's birth date
        balance - the customer's balance
        password - the customer's password

        Parameters:
        changestatus - represents the new status of the customer

      • displaycampaigns

        public void displaycampaigns()
        Checks whether the campaigns exist. If exists it will display all active campaigns.

      • addtocart

        public void addtocart(int itemID)
        Adds the items to the shopping cart. Checks whether the itemID exists and product is in stock.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the item's ID

      • emptycart

        public void emptycart()
        Empties the shopping cart.

      • loadmoney

        public void loadmoney(double loadAmount)
        Increases the balance of the customer
        Parameters:
        loadAmount - the amount of money which will increase the balance

      • changepassword

        public void changepassword(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                           java.lang.String newPassword)
        Changes the password of customer Checks whether the oldPassword matches with the current password
        Parameters:
        oldPassword - the customer's old password
        newPassword - the customer's new password

      • order

        public void order(java.lang.String customerPassword)
        Gives an order Checks whether the customerPassword matches with the current password, whether the shopping cart has items, whether the balance is enough to place an order, the active campaigns for the each item, the status of customer for the total cost , calculates the finalcost according to that status
        Parameters:
        customerPassword - the customer's password

      • updatestockamount

        public void updatestockamount()
        Updates the stock information if an item is sold.

      • awardedstatus

        public java.lang.String awardedstatus(double money)
        Parameters:
        money - the customer's final cost
        Returns:
        "GOLDEN" if the money is at least 5000
